A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm over the moon about the subtext--the (multiple) messages connected so well with the events that each character set into motion\, and I can't wait to see the direction they take now that so much has changed.  I could hardly control my limbs while watching it on the premier night\, and as I left the theater I felt warm and alive.  As an aside\, I'm also incredibly grateful that the tradition of introducing exotic alien creatures was preserved.
